title: Deutsche Bank appoints Manik Chhabra as head of global corp coverage for India, Sri Lanka
description: Manik Chhabra will assume the role of head of global corporate coverage for India and Sri Lanka at Deutsche Bank on August 19. Chhabra brings over two decades of experience from Citibank, where his last role was India head for mid corporates.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
